title: (Wed Full Podcast) Mailbag: New BF Has Painted Toenails + Childhood Lies Our Parents Told Us + Will It Pizza?
itunes:title: (Wed Full Podcast) Mailbag: New BF Has Painted Toenails + Childhood Lies Our Parents Told Us + Will It Pizza?
description:
Do you ever walk into a room and completely forget WHY or WHAT you’re doing?! We’ll tell you why that happens. You guys called us and shared the lies your parents told you growing up, Lunchbox takes a frozen pizza to big pizza chains around town to see if they’ll cook it for him, we played a really fun game of Name The  Movie Theme Song – marching band edition, and much more!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
